Title: Grissom's Divine Comedy
Plot: Grissom and his team battle the flu when they are called upon by D.D.A. Klein to investigate the deaths of several key witnesses for a grand jury case against a dangerous Las Vegas gang.
GuestStars: Bonnie Bedelia, Andrew Hawkes, David Burk, Natasha Gregson Wagner, Jack McGee, Van Epperson, Andy Forrest, Susan Merson, Dave Shalansky, Ashley Nicole Sherman, Daniel Louis Rivas, Kim Delgado, Robert LaSardo
